titleStmt.title: A threefold preseruatiue against three dangerous diseases of these latter times 1. Non proficiency in grace. 2. Fals-hearted hypocrisie. 3. Back-sliding in religion. Prescribed in a sermon at S. Pauls Crosse in London, September, 17. 1609. By William Sclater, Batcheler in Diuinity, and sometimes fellow of the Kings Colledge in Cambridge.
titleStmt.author: Sclater, William, 1575-1626.

titleStmt.title: A threefold preseruatiue against three dangerous diseases of these latter times 1. Non proficiency in grace. 2. Fals-hearted hypocrisie. 3. Back-sliding in religion. Prescribed in a sermon at S. Pauls Crosse in London, September, 17. 1609. By William Sclater, Batcheler in Diuinity, and sometimes fellow of the Kings Colledge in Cambridge.
titleStmt.author: Sclater, William, 1575-1626.

publicationStmt.publisher: By S. S[tafford] for Richard Bonian and Henry Walley, and are to be sold in Pauls Churchyard at the spred Eagle, neere the great north doore,

notesStmt.note: The words "1. Non proficiency .. in religion." are bracketed together on title page.
Cf. Folger catalogue, which gives signatures: A² B-F⁴.
Running title reads: A sermon preached at S. Pauls Crosse.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
